name: CruisePlanners
0:
”Alexa, ask Cruise Planners about Royal Caribbean.”
”ask Cruise Planners when is my next vacation”
”Alexa, ask Cruise Planners who is my agent.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cruise planners
des:
This skill allows you to receive information on your upcoming trip, as well as, details about 45+ different cruise lines and 100+ cruise ships. In order to link the account, simply use your current My Trips password or request one from your Cruise Planners travel advisor.

For example:
“Alexa, ask Cruise Planners about {cruise_line_name}.”
“Alexa, ask Cruise Planners about the ship {ship_name/cruise_name}."
“Alexa, ask Cruise Planners when is my next vacation.”
